com.eemi.ext4j.client.grid.feature

Class GroupingSummary

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eemi.ext4j.client.core.JsObject

            • com.eemi.ext4j.client.grid.feature.GroupingSummary

  • public class GroupingSummary
extends Grouping
    This feature adds an aggregate summary row at the bottom of each group that is provided by the Grouping feature.
    Author:
    alainekambi

      • setRemoteRoot

        public void setRemoteRoot(java.lang.String value)
        The name of the property which contains the Array of summary objects. It allows to use server-side calculated summaries.
